aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_intro: I'm Arpita, a web developer on a mission to make the internet a bit more delightful—one line of code at a time! Armed with a keyboard, creativity, and a healthy appetite for pizza, I thrive in the world of pixels and programming while continuously learning and exploring. I believe that laughter can tackle any tricky bug, and I aim to create websites that leave users grinning.
aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_connect: Let’s team up and craft something exceptional together, all while keeping the fun alive!
